name: Monarch Skeleton
description: The Monarch Skeleton is a formidable undead creature clad in chain mail, featuring a powerful dreadblade and marked by a commanding presence that enhances nearby allies.
memorable: It possesses potent necrotic attacks that can reduce victims' maximum hit points, making it a prime threat in combat.
goals: To lead and coordinate attacks among skeleton allies while inflicting necrotic damage on enemies.
relations: Often encountered with other skeletons that it commands in battle.
environment: Typically found in graveyards, ruins, or battlefields where it can rally undead forces.
strengths: High strength and constitution scores, along with abilities that coordinate and enhance attacks with allies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and has no defense against magical attacks made with silver.
attacks: Uses a dreadblade to deal slashing and additional necrotic damage; can restrain targets with ghostly hands.
most_powerful_ability: Grasp of the Grave, which can restrain enemies and deal continuous necrotic damage.
equipment: Dreadblade weapon and chain mail armor.
senses: Darkvision up to 120 feet enhances its capabilities in darkness.
skills: Good at resisting mind-affecting effects due to high Wisdom saving throw modifier.
additional_information: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage.
Resists nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage unless made with silver.
Advantage on attack rolls when allies are engaged with a target.
Can command nearby skeletons to attack as a reaction.
Advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.
test_queries: skeleton with necrotic attacks and commands allies
tactical undead that can reduce hit points
Monarch Skeleton's grasp of the grave ability
undead leader with strong necrotic attacks
